selected-country.title: Discover Slovenia - A Hidden Gem of Europe
selected-country.subtitle: Explore the enchanting landscapes, charming cities, and rich cultural heritage of Slovenia.

selected-country.title: Experience the Magic of Slovenia with HistoryGo
selected-country.subtitle: Unveil the stories behind the picturesque landscapes and historical treasures.
selected-country.text: Slovenia is a country of breathtaking diversity, from the emerald green waters of Lake Bled to the historic charm of Ljubljana. It’s a place where nature and culture intertwine, offering a unique blend of adventure and tradition.
selected-country.text-2: Whether you’re hiking in the Julian Alps, exploring Postojna Cave, or savoring local cuisine, Slovenia promises an unforgettable journey filled with discovery.

selected-country.title: Welcome to Slovenia
selected-country.subtitle: A journey through lush valleys, medieval towns, and pristine lakes.

selected-country.title: Discover the Heart of Europe in Slovenia
selected-country.subtitle: From alpine peaks to coastal towns, every corner of Slovenia tells a story.

selected-country.title: A Land of Natural Wonders and Cultural Richness
selected-country.subtitle: Join us on an exploration of Slovenia’s most captivating destinations.

selected-country.title: Why Slovenia Should Be Your Next Travel Destination
selected-country.subtitle: A blend of adventure, history, and tranquility.
selected-country.text: Slovenia’s natural beauty is matched only by its vibrant cultural scene. From the historic town of Piran to the snow-capped peaks of Triglav, this small country is a paradise for nature lovers and history buffs alike.
